Here you are, Cyberwolf:

Name: Striker
Gender: Male
BeastMode: Wolf
Aliegence: Maximal

Description:

A Maximal commander from future Cybertron (post-Axalon times), 
Striker and his team crashed after a space battle against a predacon 
ship (I'll just say that to make things alot simpler). Most of the 
team was killed in the crash, or the battle before or after. Rescued 
by the Alliance (this was back when the Maximals and the Alliance 
were closely allied), Striker and his team joined the Maximals. The 
only surviving and active member remaining in his team is Prowl (the 
rest were either killed, or have quit, or have just stopped RPGing).
